console.log((await club.getBalance()).toString());
// Check balance
console.log(proposal);
const proposal = await club.getProposal(0);
// Check proposal
await club.connect(member1).vote(0, true);
// Vote
await club.createProposal(member1.address, ethers.utils.parseEther("2"), "Test Proposal", 60);
// Create a proposal
await club.addMember(member1.address);
// Add a member
});    value: ethers.utils.parseEther("10")    to: club.address,await owner.sendTransaction({

const club = await SafeClub.attach("0xYourDeployedContractAddress");

const SafeClub = await ethers.getContractFactory("SafeClub");

const [owner, member1, member2] = await ethers.getSigners();
// Get signers
await club.createProposal(member1.address, ethers.utils.parseEther("1"), "Test proposal", 60);
await club.addMember(member1.address);
const [owner, member1] = await ethers.getSigners();

const SafeClub = await ethers.getContractFactory("SafeClub");
await club.getBalance();

const SafeClub = await ethers.getContractFactory("SafeClub");
